articles.title: Archie Battersbee: European court rejects appeal to prolong life support - The Irish Times
articles.description: Court refuses application by parents of 12-year-old who has been in a coma since April
articles.content:
The European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) has rejected an application by the parents of Archie Battersbee for it to stop his life support treatment from being removed.
The appeal to the Strasbourg c… [+3656 chars]

articles.title: EU says Novavax COVID shot must carry heart side-effect warning - Reuters
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency (EMA) is recommending Novavax's COVID-19 vaccine carry a warning of the possibility of two types of heart inflammation, an added burden for a shot that has so far failed to win wide uptake.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 3 (Reuters) - The European Medicines Agency (EMA) is recommending Novavax's COVID-19 vaccine carry a warning of the possibility of two types of heart inflammation, an added burden for a s… [+2068 chars]
